title: About
paragraph1: I'm a web developer with a focus on the front-end. I build solutions for businesses and am passionate about open-source software. I'm a {bitcoinCashLink} advocate, and I design and ship projects that align with my ethics.
paragraph2: I domain mainly React and TypeScript, but I'm not married with any stack: I always try to find the most optimal tools for each concrete project. Below are the technologies I work with often.
